id: api/Deposit/Create Crypto Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
title: Create Crypto Payment for Deposit Into the Wallet
description: The createChargeForDeposit mutation allows a user to create a cryptocurrency payment for a deposit into their wallet. It returns a deposit transaction with a deposit address.
